references.paper_title: Large scale gan training for high fidelity natural image synthesis
references.reason: This paper is foundational for high-quality image generation using GANs, providing a benchmark for subsequent methods.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the superiority of diffusion models over GANs for image synthesis, influencing the direction of subsequent research.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a fundamental advancement in generative modeling that the current paper builds upon.
This paper introduces consistency models, which are directly relevant to the current work and provide a fast alternative to diffusion models.

references.paper_title: Bigroc: Boosting image generation via a robust classifier
references.reason: This paper introduces the BIGROC method for boosting image generation using robust classifiers, which the current paper improves upon.
